newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $69 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle slow at $69 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area Wednesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers steady in a light test. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers.

Sales reported on 1,000 slaughter steers and 400 heifers; 18,800 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 15,400 formulated, 1,100 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week and 10 loads or 400 head of CME cattle.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 69.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 69.00.
Confirmed - 1,400 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 88,000
Wk to Date - 18,800 Week Ago - 20,500 Year Ago - 102,400
